traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: A tainted servant of Tsathogga can breathe air or water.

traits.name: Slimy
traits.desc: Any attempt to grapple a tainted servant of Tsathogga is made with disadvantage. Any contested grapple checks made by a tainted servant of Tsathogga have advantage. All touch attack spells against a tainted servant of Tsathogga are made with disadvantage.

actions.name: Frog’s Claw
actions.desc: Melee weapon attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Chaotic Croak (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: A tainted servant of Tsathogga can croak, forcing all enemies within 50 ft. to attempt a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. Any who fail use their action on their next turn to make an attack against the nearest creature if possible. A creature that fails its saving throw and cannot attack the nearest creature does not use its action on its turn.

actions.name: Tsathogga’s Spit (2/day)
actions.desc: tainted servant of Tsathogga can spit a viscous glob at a target. On a successful hit, the target becomes restrained (Escape DC 14).

actions.name: Tsathogga’s Gift (1/day)
actions.desc: A tainted servant of Tsathogga releases a 20 ft. sphere of poisonous gas through its skin. Any other creature that starts its turn within the range must make a successful DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 7 (2d6) poison damage. This sphere follows the tainted servant and dissipates after 1 minute.
